comment.author: 83925110@N00
comment._content: THIS is the Yak 36....the previous photos of the later aircraft that entered service with the Soviet Navy are in fact the Yak 38 www.aviastar.org/air/russia/yak-36.php

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives

comment.author: 83925110@N00
comment._content: The Soviet naval attaches made the original "Yak 36" statement  - in the 1976 press release as "Kiev" passed through the Bosporus straight - but it was not until the early 80's that the mistake was cleared up in the Eastern bloc aviation press
